title: Epinephrine auto-injectors; allow certain entities to stock and provide or administer during anaphylactic emergencies.
subject: Public Health and Welfare

actions.description: Referred To Public Health and Welfare

extras.summary: AN ACT TO CREATE A PROGRAM FOR THE PRESCRIBING OF SINGLE-DOSE EPINEPHRINE AUTO-INJECTORS TO AUTHORIZED ENTITIES FOR USE BY CERTAIN LAYPERSONS TO PROVIDE OR ADMINISTER TO AN INDIVIDUAL EXPERIENCING ANAPHYLAXIS; TO DEFINE TERMS; TO REQUIRE SUCH LAYPERSONS TO COMPLETE AN INITIAL ANAPHYLAXIS TRAINING PROGRAM AND AT LEAST BIENNIAL TRAINING PROGRAMS THEREAFTER TO PROVIDE OR ADMINISTER EPINEPHRINE AUTO-INJECTORS TO INDIVIDUALS EXPERIENCING ANAPHYLAXIS; TO PROVIDE IMMUNITY FROM ACTIONS RESULTING FROM THE PROVISION OR ADMINISTRATION OF EPINEPHRINE AUTO-INJECTORS IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES; TO AUTHORIZE THE STATE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO ADOPT RULES; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
